title: dailieshabit.com
introduction: Dailies is a personal companion designed to help users build better habits and celebrate achievements. It offers features like logging daily habits, journaling accomplishments, setting reminders, a custom shop for rewards, productivity challenges, and a fun approach to self-improvement.
features: Set reminders for tasks and appointments
Earn coins through tasks and spend them in a custom shop
targetPeople: Individuals looking to improve their habits and celebrate achievements

faqs.question: How can I earn coins in Dailies?
faqs.answer: You can earn coins through completing tasks and challenges in the app's ecosystem.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available for Dailies?
faqs.answer: No, there is no free trial mentioned for Dailies.
